text: iqyaM tE# Sukra taqnUriqdaM ~MvarcaqstayAq saM Ba#vaq BrAja#M gacCaq jUra#si dhRuqtA mana#sAq juShTAq viShNa#vEq tasyA$stE saqtyasa#vasaH prasaqvE vAqcO yaqntrama#SIyaq svAhA# Suqkrama#syaq-mRuta#masi vaiSvadEqva(gm) haqviH sUrya#syaq cakShuqrA&ru#hamaqgnE raqkShNaH kaqnIni#kAqM ~MyadEta# SEBiqrIya#sEq BrAja#mAnO vipaqScitAq cida#si maqnA&siq dhIra#siq dakShi#NA - [  ] 9
